sentences.en: A barrage would halt the flow upstream and lift the water level.
sentences.cn: 一道拦河坝将会在上游拦住水流，抬升水位。

sentences.en: A black Mercedes screeched to a halt beside the helicopter.
sentences.cn: 一辆黑色的梅赛德斯轿车在直升机旁嘎的一声刹住了。

sentences.en: He came to a halt at a crossroads fifty yards further on.
sentences.cn: 他在往前50码远的十字路口停了下来。

sentences.en: he decided to &B{call a halt} to all further discussion.
sentences.cn: 他决定要求中止进一步的讨论。

sentences.en: He slammed on the brakes and the car juddered to a halt.
sentences.cn: 他猛踩刹车，汽车在剧烈震动中停下来。

sentences.en: He slammed on the brakes and the car shuddered to a halt.
sentences.cn: 他猛踩刹车,车颤抖着停住了.

sentences.en: Heavy snowfalls brought traffic to a halt (= made it stop moving ).
sentences.cn: 大雪使得交通陷于停顿。

sentences.en: Her political career came to a halt in December 1988.
sentences.cn: 她的政治生涯于1988年12月画上了句号。

sentences.en: It's about time we called a halt to all this senseless arguing.
sentences.cn: 现在正是我们停止一切无谓争论的时候了.

sentences.en: Operating systems can be brought to a halt by a Trojan Horse.
sentences.cn: 操作系统可能会因为木马病毒的攻击而中止。

sentences.en: Safety concerns have led them to halt work on the dam.
sentences.cn: 出于安全方面的顾虑，他们已经停止水坝的施工。

sentences.en: She braked to a halt and switched off.
sentences.cn: 她刹车停下，然后将车熄火。

sentences.en: The battle sputtered to a halt in mid-October.
sentences.cn: 战斗于10月中旬渐渐停了下来。

sentences.en: The colonel ordered "Halt!"
sentences.cn: 上校命令道：“立定！”

sentences.en: The elevator creaked to a halt at the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯嘎吱一声停在了一层。

sentences.en: The government has failed to halt economic decline.
sentences.cn: 政府没能阻止经济衰退。

sentences.en: The parade halted by a busy corner.
sentences.cn: 游行队伍在一个热闹的拐角处停下了。

sentences.en: The Pope called for a halt to the shedding of innocent blood.
sentences.cn: 教皇呼吁不要滥杀无辜。

sentences.en: The President has called for a halt to the wave of emigration.
sentences.cn: 总统呼吁遏制移民国外的热潮。

sentences.en: The train pulled to a halt at the platform.
sentences.cn: 火车在站台边停下。

sentences.en: The World Championship was brought to a temporary halt (= was stopped from continuing ).
sentences.cn: 世界锦标赛暂停举行。

sentences.en: When the children's play got too noisy, their mother called a halt.
sentences.cn: 当孩子们的游戏过于吵闹时, 他们的母亲叫他们停下来.

phrases.tran_cn: 系统中止；系统停止；系统挂起；死机

trans.tran_cn: 停止，中止，暂停，小火车站

trans.tran_en: to prevent someone or something from continuing - used especially in news reports

trans.tran_cn: 使停止，使中断，阻止，使立定
trans.tran_en: to prevent someone or something from continuing - used especially in news reports
